Text: Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising:  The film is a sequel to "Neighbors", and follows the Radners (Rogen and Rose Byrne) having to outwit a new sorority led by Shelby (Chloë Grace Moretz), living next door in order to sell their house currently in escrow.
